metadata.dc:author: Assandri, J
Lasalvia, E
Vignale, R A
metadata.dc:description: The physiopathological mechanisms of the different degrees of the Acne Vulgaris are reviewed. The observations show the important antigenic activity of the "Propionibacterium acnes" and the cellular immunity in the inflammation. An immunologic concept could explain this process.
metadata.dc:title: Mecanismos fisiopatológicos en el acné vulgaris.
[Physiopathological mechanisms in acne vulgaris].
